Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-39684 affecting package rapidjson for versions less than 1.1.0-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-39684 affecting package rapidjson for versions less than 1.1.0-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package rapidjson is earlier than 1.1.0-8, affected by CVE-2024-39684
